sourcesContent: import*as r from"react";import{useButton as o}from"@react-aria/button";import{mergeProps as t}from"@react-aria/utils";import{usePopoverContext as e}from"./popover-context";import{pickChild as i}from"../utils/collections";import{Button as n}from"../index";import{__DEV__ as p}from"../utils/assertion";const s=r.forwardRef(((p,s)=>{const{state:m,triggerRef:l,getTriggerProps:a}=e(),{children:f,...c}=p,g=()=>m.open(),{buttonProps:d}=o({onPress:g,...c},l),u=r.Children.only(f),[,v]=i(p.children,n),x=void 0!==(null==v?void 0:v[0]);return r.cloneElement(u,a(t(u.props,x?{onPress:g,...c}:d),u.ref))}));p&&(s.displayName="NextUI.PopoverTrigger"),s.toString=()=>".nextui-popover-trigger";export default s;
